title: A Deal (Part 1)
body:
A Deal (Part 1)

"I advise you to keep your hands under control because if I start to use my hands I will turn this entire place into an orc graveyard."

When Mogul heard Evan's words his whole body started to shake.

"Hahahahah...." Suddenly he burst into laughter and his aura became completely chaotic.

"Turn this place into a graveyard...." He roared in a thunderous voice and released his aura without holding back.

Boooom!

A loud explosion rang out and the ground around Mogul shattered. The walls of the castle started to shake and the spiderwebs like cracks appeared on them.

"... Let me see how are you going to turn this place into a graveyard of orcs."
